Event¶

class due.event.Event(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

An Event is anything that can happen in an Episode. It can be an Utterance, an Action, or a Leave event (see due.event.Event.Type).

class Type[source]¶

Enumerates the three Event types:

  • Event.Type.Utterance
  • Event.Type.Leave
  • Event.Type.Action
clone()[source]¶

Clone the Event into a new object.

Returns:a new Event object that is a clone of self
Return type:due.event.Event
static load(saved)[source]¶

Load an Event that was saved with due.event.Event.save()

Parameters:saved (list) – the saved Event
mark_acted(timestamp=None)[source]¶

Mark the Event as acted storing the timestamp of the moment the event was acted. An Event is acted when it’s issued in an episode.

If no timestamp is given, the current timestamp is used.

Parameters:timestamp (datetime) – timestamp of the moment the event was acted
save()[source]¶

Export the Event to a serializable list.

Returns:a saved Event
Return type:list
